attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr GY is a stalwart of the UK education system. At over 75 he is probably one of the oldest teachers still working in Britain. To still be in the business now shows great dedication to his chosen profession and he is just the man we need to decide how to educate the children of our proud nation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
